tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE traffic_flow_data (
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
    vehicle_speed FLOAT,
    traffic_volume INT,
    road_section_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE TrafficData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  time TIME,
  vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
  speed INT,
  average_speed INT
)

CREATE TABLE RoadSegments (
  segment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  road_name VARCHAR(100),
  segment_length FLOAT,
  traffic_flow INT,
  congestion_level VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE InfrastructurePlan (
  plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  plan_description TEXT,
  implementation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE TrafficFlowData (
  flow_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  road_id INT,
  date DATE,
  average_speed INT,
  traffic_volume INT
);

CREATE TABLE TrafficIncidents (
  incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  road_id INT,
  incident_type VARCHAR,
  incident_date DATE,
  details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE RoadConstruction (
  construction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  road_id INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  contractor_name VARCHAR
);
